EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Kevlar ®/Nomex® Honeycomb
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar ®/Nomex® Honeycomb
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar ®/Nomex® Honeycomb.
As you may know, DuPont manufactures Kevlar ® and Nomex® fiber and paper. We have customers that take our product to make Honeycomb.
Below is the website that has a list of companies that make Kevlar ®/Nomex® Honeycomb. (To view each web site, please copy and paste the web address into your web browser.)
http://protectiontechnologies.dupont.com/honeycomb-core-producers
Thank you for your visit to DuPont websites which provide additional information about Nomex®, Kevlar®, Tyvek® and other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
